name: SC2 Community APIs - US
title: SC2 Community APIs - US
description:
Endpoints for StarCraft II player profiles.

**Hosts**: note that Blizzard API request paths follow this format: `{region}.api.blizzard.com/{API path}` (or `gateway.battlenet.com.cn/{API path}` for China). The requests below use the `region` parameter to set the host region in the **Try It** feature.

**Note**: `{region}` does not affect StarCraft II responses, which use the `:regionId` parameter in requests. For more information, see the [Getting Started guide](/documentation/guides/getting-started).

**accountId**: `GET /player/{accountId}` requires a player's profile ID, which is retrieved via `GET /oauth/userinfo`. See the [Authorization Code Flow](/documentation/guides/using-oauth/authorization-code-flow) and [OAuth APIs](/documentation/api-reference/oauth-api) pages for more information.

**regionId, realmId, and profileId**: retrieve these parameters via `GET /player/{accountId}`. For more information on region and realm IDs, see [Regionality, Partitions, and Localization](/documentation/guides/regionality-partitions-and-localization).

Static.description: Returns all static SC2 profile data (achievements, categories, criteria, and rewards).

:regionId.description: The region for the profile (`1`=US, `2`=EU, `3`=KO and TW, `5`=CN).

locale.description: The locale to reflect in localized data.

Metadata.description: Returns metadata for an individual's profile.

:regionId.description: The region for the profile (`1`=US, `2`=EU, `3`=KO and TW, `5`=CN).

:realmId.description: The region of the profile (`1` or `2`).

locale.description: The locale to reflect in localized data.

Profile.description: Returns data about an individual SC2 profile.

:regionId.description: The region for the profile (`1`=US, `2`=EU, `3`=KO and TW, `5`=CN).

:realmId.description: The region of the profile (`1` or `2`).

locale.description: The locale to reflect in localized data.

Ladder Summary.description: Returns a ladder summary for an individual SC2 profile.

:regionId.description: The region for the profile (`1`=US, `2`=EU, `3`=KO and TW, `5`=CN).

:realmId.description: The region of the profile (`1` or `2`).

locale.description: The locale to reflect in localized data.

Ladder.description: Returns data about an individual profile's ladder.

:regionId.description: The region for the profile (`1`=US, `2`=EU, `3`=KO and TW, `5`=CN).

:realmId.description: The region of the profile (`1` or `2`).

:ladderId.description: The ID of the ladder for which to retrieve data.

locale.description: The locale to reflect in localized data.

Grandmaster Leaderboard.description: Returns ladder data for the current season's grandmaster leaderboard.

:regionId.description: The region for the profile (`1`=US, `2`=EU, `3`=KO and TW, `5`=CN).

Season.description: Returns data about the current season.

:regionId.description: The region for the profile (`1`=US, `2`=EU, `3`=KO and TW, `5`=CN).

Player.description: Returns metadata for an individual's account.

:accountId.description: The ID of the account for which to retrieve data.

Profile.description: Retrieves data about an individual SC2 profile.

:regionId.description: The region for the profile (`1`=US, `2`=EU, `3`=KO and TW, `5`=CN).

:realmId.description: The region of the profile (`1` or `2`).

Ladders.description: Retrieves data about an individual SC2 profile's ladders.

:regionId.description: The region for the profile (`1`=US, `2`=EU, `3`=KO and TW, `5`=CN).

:realmId.description: The region of the profile (`1` or `2`).

Match History.description: Returns data about an individual SC2 profile's match history.

:regionId.description: The region for the profile (`1`=US, `2`=EU, `3`=KO and TW, `5`=CN).

:realmId.description: The region of the profile (`1` or `2`).

Ladder.description: Returns data about an individual SC2 ladder.

:regionId.description: The region for the profile (`1`=US, `2`=EU, `3`=KO and TW, `5`=CN).

:ladderId.description: The ID of the ladder for which to retrieve data.

Achievements.description: Returns data about the achievements available in SC2.

:regionId.description: The region for the profile (`1`=US, `2`=EU, `3`=KO and TW, `5`=CN).

Rewards.description: Returns data about the rewards available in SC2.

:regionId.description: The region for the profile (`1`=US, `2`=EU, `3`=KO and TW, `5`=CN).
